root.name: Kether
root.description: Overview: One of the earlier titles for the CD-i, Kether bravely went were no CD-i game had gone before mixing space flight, puzzles and first person corridor shooting. Gameplay: As an unnamed man simply referred to as the hero of space, you set out on a journey to solve the mysteries of the 5 temples located beyond treacherous asteroid belts and sprawling nefarious landscapes on various planets. Surviving the journey to a temple had you then dock with it and traverse the monster-ridden corridors within. A puzzle meeted you at the end upon which you gathered one out of five pieces of 'the Kether' which is sorely needed to bring peace to the galaxy. Features: Full motion video with voice actorsSpoken Dialogue options (French and English)
